abstract: New rules could make it easier for underwater borrowers to refinance their mortgages.
snippet: New rules could make it easier for underwater borrowers to refinance their mortgages.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)

keywords.name: unknown
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)|FMCC|OTCBB

lead_paragraph: The federal government on Monday announced changes that could make it easier for many borrowers who owed more on their home loans than their houses were worth to refinance into lower-cost mortgages.

headline.main: New Refi Rules Offer Help to More Underwater Borrowers
